experiences.description: NAMEC is a team of the SSL league, we are currently working on the software of a robot for the SSL league. I am working on the software of the robot, more specifically on the vision part.
I am currently studying at the University of Bordeaux in the field of computer science. I am in the second year of the BUT Informatique and its a 3 years degree.

projects.name: Genrative Art
projects.description: Js projects using p5.js or just a canvas to generate art, playing with perlin noise and prime numbers displayed with polar coordinates.

projects.name: digit recognition
projects.description: digit recognition using a neural network withg numpy

projects.name: pyrisk

projects.name: dating sim
projects.description: A web dating simulator for a hackathon using php, js, html and css. While on a hackathon, we had to make a app/website in 16 hours. for an association.

projects.name: SeriesTracker
projects.description: A web app to track your series, using php, js, html and css. Made while in a team project for school.
